1.title: Improvise
1.plot: Three months after quitting the Phoenix Foundation and moving to Nigeria, Mac puts aside his differences with his father and returns when he hears that Jack is the target of a murderous dictator he double-crossed.

2.title: Bravo Lead + Loyalty + Friendship
2.plot: Jack receives an emergency distress signal from one of his old Delta buddies who has been accused of terrorism in a foreign country; he and Mac quickly recruit the rest of Jack's old Delta team and stage an unsanctioned rescue operation.

3.title: Bozer + Booze + Back to School
3.plot: Mac and the team go undercover on a college campus to find an operative who is recruiting students to carry out deadly attacks; Jack joins bounty hunter Billy Colton in the hunt for a ball jumper.

4.title: Guts + Fuel + Hope
4.plot: Mac and Riley must find a way to drive a tanker filled with liquid oxygen through a region occupied by rebels and deliver it to a children's hospital; Riley helps Mac decide whether or not to allow his father back into his life.

5.title: Dia de Muertos + Sicarios + Family
5.plot: When Oversight's attempt to capture a cartel's leader goes bad, MacGyver and Jack rush to Mexico to pull their boss out while racing through the heart of the country during Dia de Muertos celebrations. Also, Bozer and Riley use Halloween as a distraction to gather intel on a man accused of treason.

6.title: Murdoc + MacGyver + Murdoc
6.plot: Murdoc abducts MacGyver's girlfriend to force Mac to help him rescue his son from a kidnapper; a dangerous person from Murdoc's personal life shows up, giving Mac a glimpse into the villain's past.

7.title: Scavengers + Hard Drive + Dragonfly
7.plot: Matty sends MacGyver and team to Ghana to recover a hard drive from an e-waste landfill that is run by a powerful and violent man. But when Matty refuses to reveal what's on the drive, other than a mysterious file called 'Dragonfly,' the team speculates about what could be so important to her.

8.title: Revenge + Catacombs + Le Fantome
8.plot: An Irish military intelligence officer claims to know the whereabouts of The Ghost, the lethal bomb maker whom Mac has been hunting for years.

9.title: Specimen 234 + PAPR + Outbreak
9.plot: When a vile containing a deadly virus is stolen from the Center for Disease Control in Atlanta, Mac and the team race to recover it before the thief unleashes a global pandemic.

10.title: Matty + Ethan + Fidelity
10.plot: Macgyver and the team help rescue a CIA agent who is deep undercover with an illegal trafficking company.

11.title: Mac + Fallout + Jack
11.plot: Mac and Jack hit the road for a weekend of relaxation in Las Vegas, but their mini-vacation is cut short when someone from their past abducts them and locks them in a concrete room; Matty tasks Riley, Bozer and Leanna with stealing a diamond encoded with terrorist intelligence from a princess in Milan.

12.title: Fence + Suitcase + Americium-241
12.plot: Phoenix teams up with a woman who's a soccer mom by day but a master thief by night to catch one of her contacts, an underworld criminal, who has hired her to steal a dirty bomb.

13.title: Wilderness + Training + Survival
13.plot: Mac, Riley and Bozer go on a weekend of survival training, then they run into a violent group of criminals who are searching for a lost crate of money. Jack and Matty go on a road trip to place Ethan and his family in witness protection.

14.title: Father + Bride + Betrayal
14.plot: An international crime boss offers to surrender if he's allowed to return to the United States to watch his daughter walk down the aisle; Mac and the team crash the wedding to ensure the crime lord doesn't run.

15.title: K9 + Smugglers + New Recruit
15.plot: After a surprising introduction to Phoenix's newest recruit, Desi, MacGyver and team are assigned to escort and protect an ATF (alcohol, tobacco, firearms) gun-sniffing dog who has a bounty on his head, only to discover they're not the only ones crashing the weapon drop.

16.title: Lidar + Rogues + Duty
16.plot: The Phoenix Foundation must recover the body of a pilot whose plane crashed while testing an experimental laser mapping system that Mac designed; Riley tries to identify the hacker who tricked a SWAT team into arresting her and Elwood.

17.title: Seeds + Permafrost + Feather
17.plot:

18.title: Murdoc + Helman + Hit
18.plot:

1.title: The Rising
1.plot: Special agents Angus MacGyver and Jack Dalton join forces to recover a missing bio-weapon, with the ability to destroy hundreds of thousands of people with one single drop.

2.title: Metal Saw
2.plot: MacGyver and the team attempt to rescue Sarah, Jack's former CIA partner, who went missing in Venezuela after obtaining evidence to take down an international arms dealer.

3.title: Awl
3.plot: MacGyver and the team are in Malaysia to extract a terrorist groups' money man, Ralph, who holds key intel to an impending attack. But when Ralph is shot, the mission goes south, and MacGyver must keep Ralph alive in order to learn the terrorists' plans.

4.title: Wire Cutter
4.plot: Mac and Jack partner with older versions of themselves, a Russian bomb programmer and his estranged handler, to shut down a Soviet-era warhead in Moscow. But when the antiquated computer needed becomes inoperable, Mac must find a way to fix it with only duct tape and wire.

5.title: Toothpick
5.plot: Using only an armrest, a curtain rod and a toothpick, MacGyver must fix a sabotaged train in order to protect a whistleblower who has proof that her boss is selling weapons to U.S. enemies.

6.title: Wrench
6.plot: Using only a wrench and rope, MacGyver must diffuse a bomb set near the United Nations by his old nemesis, "The Ghost", a notorious criminal whose work killed his mentor, and track him down before he strikes again.

7.title: Can Opener
7.plot: MacGyver is tasked to go undercover as an inmate in a maximum security prison to break out El Noche, a notorious drug kingpin, using only batteries and salt, and track him to his cartel's secret location and dismantle it.

8.title: Corkscrew
8.plot: MacGyver comes face to face with Murdoc, an international assassin hired to kill him, he must defend both himself and Bozer, armed with only a corkscrew and paper towel rolls.

9.title: Chisel
9.plot: With only a chisel and matchbook, MacGyver and team must defend U.S. embassy workers in Latvia from extremists attempting to retrieve their leader.

10.title: Pliers
10.plot: MacGyver uses pliers to rescue the kidnapped prodigy from his old middle school.

11.title: Scissors
11.plot: Using a microwave and a power strip, MacGyver and Jack look for Riley when she disappears after hacking into the NSA, possibly starting World War III.

12.title: Screwdriver
12.plot: Using a screwdriver and bug spray, MacGyver must find the U.S. government mole who is leaking classified intel to the organization that is trying to take down The Phoenix Foundation. Also, Sarah returns to help with the mission, and Nikki reappears, but Mac can't tell which side she's on.

13.title: Large Blade
13.plot: On the way back from capturing a war criminal, Mac and Jack's helicopter crashes in a remote area of Kazakhstan, injuring their pilot and allowing their prisoner to escape with Jack's gun. Using a large blade and a water bottle, MacGyver must get help as the pilot's condition worsens and before the war criminal takes them as prisoners.

14.title: Fish Scaler
14.plot: Using a fish scaler and fishing wire, Mac and Jack must track down a corrupt FBI agent, who has framed a man for murder.

15.title: Magnifying Glass
15.plot: Mac and his team suspect that the Zodiac Killer has returned when Matty's goddaughter and her boyfriend are murdered in a San Francisco park.

16.title: Hook
16.plot: While tracking down the dangerous fugitive Aaron Deckard, Mac and Jack face the notorious Colton family of bounty hunters who already kidnapped their mark. Now, using a hook and a car cable, Mac must extract the criminal from the Colton's, who are unaware of the deadly situation they're in. Also, Bozer and Riley try to hack into Jack's CIA file to find out about his history with Matty.

17.title: Ruler
17.plot: Bozer's first overseas mission goes terribly wrong when Mac and the team are blamed for a terrorist bombing and the Phoenix Foundation is forced to disavow them. Using a ruler and coconut oil to make disguises, the team must avoid authorities and clear their names without any support from back home.

18.title: Flashlight
18.plot: Mac and the team travel to Hawaii to help out when an earthquake strikes and partner with Chin Ho and Kono to rescue a group of government scientists trapped in a building about to collapse.

19.title: Compass
19.plot: Mac and Jack help Mac's close friend from M.I.T. after she fakes her own death to prevent someone from killing her in order to suppress her scientific research.

20.title: Hole Puncher
20.plot: The team intercepts a message for Murdoc from a terror group, so Mac poses as Murdoc to protect their intended target.

21.title: Cigar Cutter
21.plot: Murdoc enacts his plan to kill every agent in the Phoenix Complex.

1.title: DIY or DIE
1.plot: MacGyver hunts for a Navy SEAL who is being held captive in the Middle East.

2.title: Muscle Car + Paper Clips
2.plot: Using a necklace and a microwave transmitter, Mac and the team attempt to locate Riley after her first solo mission with a group of dangerous hackers goes off the rails.

3.title: Roulette Wheel + Wire
3.plot: MacGyver and the team go undercover in a high stakes casino to steal diamonds from a vault before a terrorist group gets there first and trades the jewels for a weapon of mass destruction.

4.title: X-Ray + Penny
4.plot: When Murdoc drugs and kidnaps MacGyver, Mac uses a needle and his teeth to escape and join the team to save Murdoc's next victim.

5.title: Skull + Electromagnet
5.plot: The team is pulled away from their Halloween plans when they head into the dreaded Bermuda Triangle to retrieve the Vice President's son after his plane goes down with a mysterious prisoner on board.

6.title: Jet Engine + Pickup Truck
6.plot: MacGyver and the team are sent to Nigeria to extinguish an oil well fire set off by revel forces intent on keeping the fire burning.

7.title: Duct Tape + Jack
7.plot: MacGyver uses a heater and tabasco sauce to help a key presidential candidate in Ecuador receive a heart transplant he desperately needs after a rebel group tries to sabotage delivery of the organ.

8.title: Packing Peanuts + Fire
8.plot: Mac and the team must steal a priceless painting in order to draw out a black market art dealer; Bozer attends a spy training academy; Riley must deal with the return of her estranged father.

9.title: CD-ROM + Hoagie Foil
9.plot: Mac, Dalton, and Cage pursue terrorists who have obtained a canister of deadly nerve gas; Bozer has been paired with Leanna for interrogation resistance training; Riley considers accepting her estranged father's invitation to dinner.

10.title: War Room + Ship
10.plot: Mac helps a group of researchers trapped in the Arctic Ocean on a research vessel; Jack kidnaps Elwood, only to end up helping him deal with his past; Bozer and Leanna find themselves handcuffed together in a new test.

11.title: Bullet + Pen
11.plot: The LAPD interrupts the team's Christmas celebration to arrest Mac for terrorism when they find a body in a building destroyed by a bomb Mac built.

12.title: Mac + Jack
12.plot: When Mac's nemesis rigs Mac's house with explosives and traps him and Jack inside, Mac uses a karaoke mic and an audio transformer to let the team know that the bomb is a distraction for a bigger one.

13.title: CO2 Sensor + Tree Branch
13.plot: While participating in a challenge for government operatives to create robotic combat machines, Mac must help his biggest competitor when her vehicle is hacked and headed for the Pentagon.

14.title: Mardi Gras Beads + Chair
14.plot: The team heads to New Orleans to track down a con artist posing as the wife of one of Jack's old CIA aliases; enemies of his alias resurface looking for revenge.

15.title: Murdoc + Handcuffs
15.plot: MacGyver and Jack get Murdoc in custody but are trailed by Murdoc's mentor (Michael Des Barres).

16.title: Hammock + Balcony
16.plot: The partying son of a Serbian war criminal takes his new bride to an exclusive French chateau for their honeymoon, and Matty assigns Leanna to work with Bozer, Mac, and Riley to go undercover and find out where the father is. Meanwhile, Jack convinces Elwood and Jill to help him break into Matty's house to find out what she's hiding from Mac.

17.title: Bear Trap + Mob Boss
17.plot: Mac, Jack and Riley set out to find a mobster-turned-informant after he's kidnapped and taken to Chernobyl by an international crime boss; Bozer struggles to keep a secret from Matty.

18.title: Riley + Airplane
18.plot: Mac and the team search for a former government tech who stole classified intel and cross paths with the Coltons, who are hunting the same man for different reasons.

19.title: Benjamin Franklin + Grey Duffle
19.plot: Mac and the team investigate the death of Dawn's supervisor at the CIA and uncover a dirty agent and a massive counterfeiting ring.

20.title: Skyscraper - Power
20.plot: Mac and Jack attempt to rescue a billionaire's son after he is kidnapped by a former Navy SEAL.

21.title: Wind + Water
21.plot: While MacGyver is in Puerto Rico helping his friend rebuild his hurricane-damaged home, he is taken hostage in the bank his friend manages when robbers attempt to steal $2 million.

22.title: UFO + Area 51
22.plot: Riley and Mac are assigned to investigate a mysterious object at Area 51; Riley discovers top secret information on Mac's father, but is unsure if she should give it to Mac.

23.title: MacGyver + MacGyver
23.plot: When Mac decides to quit Phoenix, he gets a shocking surprise in the form of his father; Bozer also gets a shocking surprise.

locations: St. Luke Medical Center, 2632 E. Washington Blvd., Pasadena, California, USA::(Pilot)
imdb.plot outline: A reimagining of the classic series, is an action-adventure drama about 20-something Angus "Mac" MacGyver, who creates the Department of External Services (DXS), a clandestine organization within the U.S. government where he uses his extraordinary talent for unconventional problem-solving and vast scientific knowledge to save lives. Joining his team on high-risk missions around the globe is maverick former CIA agent Jack Dalton; Patricia Thornton, an ex-field agent turned director of operations; and Riley Davis, an unpredictable computer hacker with a chip on her shoulder. At home, MacGyver is entertained by his ambitious roommate, Wilt Bozer. Under the aegis of the Department of External Services, MacGyver takes on the responsibility of saving the world, armed to the teeth with resourcefulness and little more than bubble gum and a paper clip.
imdb.title: MacGyver
plot: Young Angus "Mac" _MacGyver_ (qv) works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.::Anonymous

A reimagining of the classic series, is an action-adventure drama about 20-something Angus "Mac" _MacGyver_ (qv), who creates the Department of External Services (DXS), a clandestine organization within the U.S. government where he uses his extraordinary talent for unconventional problem-solving and vast scientific knowledge to save lives. Joining his team on high-risk missions around the globe is maverick former CIA agent Jack Dalton; Patricia Thornton, an ex-field agent turned director of operations; and Riley Davis, an unpredictable computer hacker with a chip on her shoulder. At home, _MacGyver_ (qv) is entertained by his ambitious roommate, Wilt Bozer. Under the aegis of the Department of External Services, _MacGyver_ (qv) takes on the responsibility of saving the world, armed to the teeth with resourcefulness and little more than bubble gum and a paper clip.::CBS
